entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump How about an executive order forcing WA state to pay us our unemployment. The stimulus was great but w/out unemployment providing stable income COVID-19 will be nothing compared to riots the like of 1991 LA. The ESD here has 100% crashed. Can't get through,no return EM's #DIRE
